name: Dungeon Wizard (cryodensity)
description:
Hi! I'm cryodensity, and this is my first ever game that I developed.

I built and developed Dungeon Wizard for the One-button game jam, as well as using it as a base to start building my knowledge and skills with unity and game development overall.

Dungeon Wizard is a point and click platformer, using only one button (Left mouse button) to attack and destroy surrounding mobs and objects!

Work your way through the designed levels and have fun! It's a little short, as I said I'm just trying to build my knowledge on game dev and have some fun :') Feedback is encouraged!
